content: set of knitted helm hat scarf and gloves for baby in drops alpaca sizes from 1 month to 4 years **size** 1/3 6/9 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 100-100-100 150-150 g colour no 6205 light blue drops pointed and double pointed needles size 2 5mm/us 1 or 2 or size needed to obtain correct gauge **pattern links ** norwegian version 1 german version 2 french version 3 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/no/visoppskrift php d_nr=b14&d_id=16&lang=no 2 http //www garnstudio com/lang/de/visoppskrift php d_nr=b14&d_id=16&lang=de 3 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b14&d_id=16
